review_details:
We had a fabulous day with Anthi and Crew. They made us feel at home and the food was fabulous! We met lovely people from different countries. Such a unique experience! We highly recommend them!!

Tricia, Mark, Peggy and Bob
New York

If you're looking for great Italian food with great service and very welcoming atmosphere, this is the place. It's been run by the same family since 1944. Pasquale (Patsy) and his lovely wife Concetta could not have been any more welcoming and we were introduced to their son, Sal, who runs the kitchen as Head Chef. I highly recommend it!

We had a short but lovely stay for a wedding weekend. The room and bed (very important) were very comfortable. The staff were very helpful and the breakfast was substantial. Will highly recommend your hotel. Wish we had time to take advantage of your spa and pool.
